segments.text: I see the boy reaching into the cookie jar, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbling, and he’s not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to regret this in a minute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and the floor is getting more slippery by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman hasn’t noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
